Class Entity3D

java.lang.Object
  es.ucm.look.ar.ar3D.core.drawables.Entity3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable3D
public class Entity3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable3D

Represents an 3D entity that can be contained in a scene
